WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
When we convert svg images to jpeg format , we get images with blue  background...
How to fix this?
Thanks...

Comments.Message:
I has the same trouble but my background color was Black color ... 
If you obtain a good export to PNG format and not a good JPEG export, it's caused by the transparency ... 

In this case, you must create another bitmap with the same width et height and clean the background with , for example, Color.White, and draw in it the original bitmap 
then you will obtain (using Save() method) a not transparency image in JPEG ...
